title: Death by a Thousand Cuts Pt. I with Jacob Gallagher
description:
Welcome to the party. This week, Jimmy and Larry are joined by old friend of the pod and Men's Fashion Editor at Off Duty for the Wall Street Journal, Jacob Gallagher, for a frustrated podcast of epic proportions. Jacob hosts the boys for TF’s first ever vibe check of a guest’s crib and discusses jeans being cancelled, Supreme’s relevancy, or lack thereof, in 2020, how guys can get into tailoring, NBA fashion unfortunately going nuclear, the importance of celebrity personal style, what factors go into the sneaker hype cycle, the fit tea economy, why his DMs are always open, hip-hop’s most tragic generation and much more in part 1 of this extremely cerebral episode the The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
